name: Steam Momo
description: Soft, slightly chewy outer dough with a juicy and flavorful filling inside.

name: Fried Momo
description: Crispy, golden-brown outer layer with a crunchy texture.

name: Kothey Momo
description: Crispy and golden on one side, soft and juicy on the other.

name: Chilli Momo
description: Spicy, tangy, and saucy version of momo, bursting with bold flavors.

name: Jhol Momo
description: Warms your day with spicy, tangy, and slightly creamy soup (jhol).
